org.wicketstuff.security.hive.authentication

Class DefaultSubject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wicketstuff.security.hive.authentication.BaseSubject
      • org.wicketstuff.security.hive.authentication.DefaultSubject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Subject, WicketSubject

    public class DefaultSubject
extends BaseSubject
implements WicketSubject
    Default implementation of a Subject.Targeted for wicket applications. By default it authenticates all classes, components and models. This makes it an ideal candidate for single login applications.
    Author:
    marrink
    See Also:
    WicketSubject, Serialized Form
